alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; North Cass; North Itasca; North St. Louis; South Cass; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 21 at 5:20AM CDT until March 22 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...North St. Louis, North Itasca, Central St. Louis, North Cass, South Itasca, South Cass and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band and the Bois Forte Band, Deer Creek, Nett Lake and, Lake Vermilion areas. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 7 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; North Cass; North Itasca; North St. Louis; South Cass; South Itasca
